item.description:
Ok lets all head out and listen to some music and shake, wiggle, rock and roll, we are the best group around when it comes to HAVING FUNDress is casul as this band plays in the sports bar, there is an adjacent restuarant but we eat in the sports bar area, and they have Keno and Flatscreens.

 Best of all No Cover!!!!!!!!!!

When you come in ask the Hostess for" Claire's table",  food is very good and reasonable, they usuually have good price buster specials,  they  give plenty, and they will do seperate checks.

 

Band Rock City

Time 9pm

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner and Dancing
